subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dan Uggla drove in five runs, Andrew Miller allowed two hits in seven innings and the visiting Florida Marlins beat the Washington Nationals, 11-0, on Saturday night for their sixth consecutive victory.
snippet: Dan Uggla drove in five runs, Andrew Miller allowed two hits in seven innings and the visiting Florida Marlins beat the Washington Nationals, 11-0, on Saturday night for their sixth consecutive victory.
